title: Welcome to Version 2.0
description: Just deployed the new portfolio design with advanced sticky animations! Check out the Education section.
content:
Today marks a major milestone! I've completely revamped the Education section with a Sticky Glass Stack effect. The cards now feature:

  • 3D Tilt Interactions
  • Glassmorphism UI
  • Smooth GSAP Animations

Explore the site and let me know what you think!
